Whats_special.description: Welcome to your dream farmhouse! This stunning new construction home boasts over 2500 square feet of modern living space, designed for comfort and style. With 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, this home offers ample space for your family to thrive. Should the need arise, you have the flexibility to add a 4th bedroom for extra space, and an additional bathroom for added convenience. As you enter the home, you'll be greeted by an inviting open-concept floor plan that seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas. The spacious living room features high ceilings, creating a grand and open atmosphere. A cozy fireplace and large windows fill the room with natural light, creating a warm and inviting space for gatherings and relaxation.

Experience luxury living in The Solstice, a beautifully crafted home featuring premium finishes and thoughtful design throughout. This elegant residence offers a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.
